confirm-no-password.text: You are about to create an account without password protection. Anyone that has access to your device will have access to your account funds. <1 /> <3 /> Are you sure you want to continue without setting up a password?
confirm-no-password.title: Continue without password

confirm-weak-password.text: You are about to protect this account with a weak password. Anyone that has access to your device will have access to your account funds. <1 /> <3 /> Are you sure you want to continue without setting up a strong password?
confirm-weak-password.title: Continue without strong password

mnemonic.helper-text: A mnemonic sentence is a group of 12 to 24 words
mnemonic.label: Mnemonic sentence
mnemonic.title: Import Existing

secret-key.helper-text: A Stellar secret key is 56 alphanumeric characters long and starts with an S
secret-key.label: Secret key
secret-key.title: Import Existing

multisig-account.explanation-long: Make sure the account to join has at least 2 XLM on it, so they can add you as a co-signer.
multisig-account.explanation-short: Make sure the account to join has been funded.
multisig-account.label: Multi-signature account

cosigner-import.label: Co-signs shared account
cosigner-import.description: Key is signer of another account

description.mnemonic: Restore account from mnemonic backup phrase

password.label: Password protection
password.protected: Your secret key will be encrypted
password.unprotected: Your secret key will be unprotected

validation.no-account-name: No account name has been entered.
